mapper.insert:
insert into mod_rec_comparison(trade_no, order_no, status, result, create_time) values
(#{entity.tradeNo}, #{entity.orderNo}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.result}, #{entity.createTime})
on duplicate key update trade_no = values(trade_No) , order_no = values(order_no), status = values(status) , result = values(result) , create_time = values(create_time)
